articles.author: Carlo Boffa
articles.title: Ruble tumbles as Russia’s war economy comes under increasing strain - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: New sanctions package closes one of the last conduits of hard currency to Moscow.
articles.content: The ruble has been under steady pressure all summer, as the price of oil Russias most important export, despite Western sanctions has fallen due to weak Chinese and European demand and rapidly growin… [+2001 chars]
